channel.title: Interfaces help (tabs)
channel.description:
okai so i want to add interfaces to moy client... lik ei want to add in the place were the icons near inventory are like the bag the prayer choice spellbooks options and crap i want to add 1 thing there and make it so that one of the options is like a bar going down like taht pking skill tab something like taht but with dif icons on the side and diffrent text like a claws picture and then when u click it...it opens up the pk shop... i hope you understand what im saying.
Some pictures of what i mean...i just want to add these to my client i have the sprites.
[IMG]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/3954/210b2c396f944a97a3dc98c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/6081/9e80803c08ba4da480b83b5.png[/img]
